pages.name: Ritual of Regeneration
pages.text: Use a $(l:bloodmagic:rituals/ritual_diviner#dusk)Ritual Diviner [Dusk]$(/l) for easier construction.

Casts regeneration on entities within its range if they are missing health. $(br2)$(water)Water Runes: 8 $(br)$(air)Air Runes: 6 $(br)$(fire)Fire Runes: 6 $(br)$(earth)Earth Runes: 20 $(br)$()Dusk Runes: 4$(br2)$()Total Runes: 44

pages.title: Corrosive
pages.text: Steals health from non-players inside of its Vampirism range and directly heals players.

pages.title: Range
pages.text: (Healing) Entities within this range will receive a regeneration buff. $(br) $(li)Maximum Volume: Full Range. $(li)Horizontal Radius: 20 $(li)Vertical Radius: 20

pages.title: Range
pages.text: (Vampirism) Mobs within this range have their health syphoned to heal players in the Healing range. $(br) $(li)Maximum Volume: Full Range. $(li)Horizontal Radius: 20 $(li)Vertical Radius: 20
